Crimes.Crime_Name: Making false statements for the purpose of procuring a passport
Crimes.Dispute_Type: Administrative dispute over passport service refusal
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of five-year passport service refusal based on false information
Crimes.Decision_Level: Administrative decision by Passport Canada adjudicator
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's claim of no intent to mislead was rejected; errors found intentional
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Passport application documents, custody and relationship status records
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Provision of false information in passport application
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Intentional submission of false information regarding relationship and custody
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Administrative proceeding followed by judicial review
Crimes.Application_Error: False declaration of cohabitation and custody status
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied to administrative decision
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: None identified – court found adjudicator considered relevant evidence
Crimes.Legal_Standard: No requirement to prove intent to defraud under Canadian Passport Order
Crimes.Application_Factor: False information provided in child’s passport application
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Five-year ban on passport services imposed
Crimes.Authority: Passport Canada under authority of Canadian Passport Order
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the five-year refusal was reasonable
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Sections 9 and 10 of the Canadian Passport Order
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Submission of false information in passport application
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: Sections 9 and 10 of the Canadian Passport Order
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Discrepancy between application claims and factual reality regarding residence and custody
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Process deemed fair; applicant had opportunity to respond
Crimes.Document_Fraud: False statements in official passport application form
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant’s explanation not accepted by adjudicator
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claimed lack of intent to mislead, challenged reasonableness of penalty
Crimes.Jurisdictional_Focus: Federal administrative law and passport issuance authority
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Challenge to administrative penalty through judicial review
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Not applicable – relates to passport services, not immigration inadmissibility

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Administrative dispute over passport service refusal
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of five-year passport service refusal based on incomplete or false application
Crimes.Decision_Level: Administrative decision by Passport Canada adjudicator
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant’s explanation not accepted; false claim of cohabitation found deliberate
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Passport application, residency and custody documentation
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Submission of false information in passport application
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: False statement about living arrangement with child’s mother
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Administrative proceeding with subsequent judicial review
Crimes.Application_Error: Falsely claimed cohabitation with child’s mother
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: None noted – adjudicator relied on available evidence
Crimes.Legal_Standard: No requirement to prove intent to mislead under Canadian Passport Order
Crimes.Application_Factor: False information submitted in child’s passport application
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Five-year ban on passport services imposed
Crimes.Authority: Passport Canada under Canadian Passport Order
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the five-year refusal was justified based on false application
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Providing false information in passport application
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Contradiction between application and factual circumstances
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Applicant had opportunity to respond; process found fair
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Misrepresentation in official government application form
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant’s credibility questioned and not accepted by adjudicator
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Argued that no forgery charge was laid and error was unintentional
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Not applicable – pertains to passport services, not immigration status
